person.persName: Peter Hinkle (Knox County, Kentucky, farmer and 1st lieut & capt 7th Ky Inf USA)

body.p: Knox County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. North Carolina native. Married to Sally Ann Valentine Hinkle in Knox County, Kentucky, on June 1, 1854. Father of Martha Ann Hinkle, John T. Hinkle, William A. Hinkle, Isaac S. Hinkle, and Mary J. Hinkle. Farmer in Knox County in 1860. Served in the 7th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as first lieutenant and captain from September 22, 1861, to August 27, 1863.
